title: Southern California school board OKs curriculum after Gov. Gavin Newsom threatened a $1.5M fine
description: Gov. Gavin Newsom threatened the fine over a social studies curriculum.

title: Suspect at large following shooting at hospital in Portland, Oregon
description: A suspect is at large following a shooting at a hospital in Portland, Oregon, police said. At least one person has been shot amid the "active tactical incident."

title: 4 stabbed in series of unprovoked attacks; suspect shot dead by officer: Police
description: Four people were injured, one critically, in a series of unprovoked stabbings in Maryland on Saturday, police said.

title: As Taiwan prepares for anti-invasion exercises, China sends dozens of warplanes toward the island
description: The warplanes included fighter jets and bombers, marking a forceful display.

title: 4 dead in triple murder-suicide, including 10-month-old
description: An Oklahoma mother shot her three children dead before killing herself in an apparent triple murder-suicide, state investigators said.

title: Murder trial of rapper YNW Melly ends in mistrial after jury deadlocks; retrial likely
description: A jury deadlocked in the trial of rapper YNW Melly in South Florida.

title: Train derailment in northern Montana spills freight, but hazmat car safe
description: It left 25 cars tangled up along a major east-west railroad corridor.

title: FAMU bans football players from facility after release of rap video shot in team's locker room
description: Florida A&M has banned its players from the football team’s facilities.

title: Russian special forces kill gunman who broke into private house near Moscow
description: A heavily-armed gunman broke into a private house in Moscow's suburbs.

title: Mississippi lawmaker says tutu photo is misused in campaign. He's raising money for cancer research
description: Mississippi Republican state Sen. Jeremy England says he intentionally wore a “very embarrassing” Halloween costume to raise money for breast cancer research

title: Pregnant woman killed, 4 others injured in shooting at Houston park
description: A pregnant woman was shot and killed after a fight broke out at a Houston park early Saturday, her family told ABC Houston station KTRK.

title: Court strikes down limits on filming of police in Arizona
description: A federal judge has ruled that an Arizona law is unconstitutional.

title: Thousands march on Jerusalem as former Israeli officials beg Netanyahu to halt legislation overhaul
description: It's a last-ditch show of force to block Netanyahu’s controversial plan.

title: Charges dismissed against white woman who spat on Black woman during protests in Connecticut
description: A judge has dismissed hate crime and other charges against her.

title: Massive protests take place against mob assaults on women in India's remote northeastern state
description: There were mob assaults on two women who were paraded naked.

title: Malaysia cuts short music fest after British band slams anti-gay laws
description: Malaysia’s government has cut short a music festival after the lead singer of British band The 1975 slammed the country’s anti-gay laws and kissed a male bandmate during their performance

title: 'I am on my way back': Jamie Foxx speaks out about health issues
description: Jamie Foxx has spoken out and addressed his medical complications for the first time since he was hospitalized in April.

title: Israeli forces shoot and kill Palestinian motorist after alleged car-ramming attack in West Bank
description: Israeli forces shot and killed a Palestinian in disputed circumstances in the northern West Bank — the latest in an ongoing surge of violence that shows no sign of slowing down

title: Sophia Smith scores twice for US in in 3-0 victory over Vietnam to open the Women's World Cup
description: Sophia Smith scored twice for the United States in the opening half and the two-time defending champions kicked off the Women’s World Cup with a 3-0 victory over tournament first-timers Vietnam on Saturday

title: Body of missing toddler recovered in Delaware River days after flood: Police
description: The body of Matilda Sheils was recovered in the Delaware River, officials said.

title: Alabama governor approves political map that refuses to create 2nd majority-Black congressional district
description: Alabama governor approves political map that refuses to create 2nd majority-Black congressional district

title: Man accused of killing his ex-girlfriend's 2-year-old faces 20 state charges
description: A Michigan man accused of assaulting his former girlfriend and then killing her 2-year-old daughter now faces premeditated murder and 19 other state charges.
